title: An Act relative to the uniform special deposit

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Peisch of Wellesley, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1281) of Alice Hanlon Peisch relative to uniform special deposits.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
